title: Kia India looks to expand sales, service network to 700 touchpoints by year-end
description: Kia India aims to reach 700 touchpoints in 300 cities by year-end, focusing on Tier-1 and Tier-2 markets. They also prioritize green initiatives and plan to expand the certified pre-owned outlets to 100 by 2024.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
